thread.title: Google’s AI-powered Assistant is coming to millions more Android phones
thread.title_full: Google’s AI-powered Assistant is coming to millions more Android phones

author: Abhimanyu Ghoshal
title: Google’s AI-powered Assistant is coming to millions more Android phones
text:
FIND OUT WHY 
One of the first handsets to get it is the new LG G6 ; starting this week, it’ll roll out to English users in the US, Australia, Canada and the UK, as well as German speakers in Germany. More languages and countries will be covered over the coming year. 
With that, Assistant is set to become a household name. In addition to mobile devices, the bot is also available on Android Wear 2.0-based smartwatches and is coming soon to TVs and cars . Today’s announcement will likely see Google in good stead as it takes on Amazon’s Alexa , which is also quickly gaining ground and expanding its list of capabilities.
